m_szDocTitle: Coordinating energy management systems and intelligent electrical distribution grid control systems - Alstom, Grid
m_szDocSumamry: Coordinating energy management systems and intelligent electrical distribution grid control systems European Patent Application EP2533397 A2 Abstract: Aspects of a multi-level electrical distribution control system associated with an electrical distribution grid are disclosed. Coordination between the multi-level control system, the electrical distribution grid and an electrical transmission system can provide improved utilization of energy within the electrical distribution grid. Further, dynamic reconfiguration of the electric distribution grid can improve reliability of the electric distrib
